stadium.name: The High-Pass Pitch
stadium.description: A field built at a breathtaking altitude in a fortified mountain pass. The air is painfully thin, and the weather is dangerously unpredictable.

stats.pregame_ritual: Tying a small, hand-carved wooden bird to their gear.
Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Whispering a secret fear to the Trollball before the game.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Dipping their hands in a bucket of ice-cold well water.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Exchanging well-wishes with their direct opponent before the game starts.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

stadium.name: The Sinking Field
stadium.description: A notoriously poorly-maintained stadium built on reclaimed marshland. The ground is unstable, often waterlogged, and sections of the stands are known to collapse.

stats.pregame_ritual: Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Meditating silently in the corner of the locker room.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Daring a teammate to eat a live worm.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Tapping each piece of their armor in a specific sequence.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Meditating silently in the corner of the locker room.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è LIVE FROM THE CLOUDS! üéôÔ∏è

**Gooooood evening, Trollball fans!** This is your favorite demon on the microphone, **Nok the Corrupter**, coming to you LIVE from the dizzying, nauseating heights of **The High-Pass Pitch**! Holy cow, folks, the air is thin up here! I can barely breathe, and I don't even *need* to breathe! We‚Äôve got a real barn-burner of a Week 4 matchup today, and I am absolutely vibrating with excitement‚Äîor maybe that's just the vertigo setting in!

Visiting these treacherous peaks today is the team that holds the black, beating heart of my affection, the pride of the Sinking Field, **THE EBON GATE CORRUPTORS**! üòà They‚Äôve marched up the mountain to face off against the locals, **The Oread's Summit Tamers**! Now, I try to stay neutral, folks, you know I do, but let's look at the facts! While the Tamers were in their locker room sharing a cup of‚Äîget this‚Äî*non-alcoholic grog* with **Zadoc Wyatan** (boring!), the Corruptors were getting ready the right way! I saw **Terle Chenay** in the tunnel seeing who could belch the loudest, and **Smith Syst** was daring rookies to eat live worms! That‚Äôs the kind of gut-rot fortitude you need to win in the Everwar!

**Kython** and his little circus of **Prismatic Troups** might think they own the sky, but they‚Äôre about to get grounded! **Simsar Carrelli** is out there counting the clouds, but he better keep his head on a swivel because the Tamers are looking to protect their home turf. Will the thin air choke the Corruptors, or will the Tamers freeze when the real heat arrives? Grab a drink‚Äîpreferably something stronger than Zadoc's punch‚Äîand buckle up! **IT'S TROLLBALL TIME!** ü©∏üèà
postGame:
# üèÅ FINAL: CORRUPTORS CRUSH THE SUMMIT! üèÅ

**HOLY MACKEREL, WHAT A GAME!** ü§Ø Put a mark in the win column for the bad guys, folks! The final score is **The Ebon Gate Corruptors 2, The Oread's Summit Tamers 0**! A shutout! A glorious, violent shutout! The mountain has been conquered, and the Corruptors are coming down with the victory loot!

Let‚Äôs recap the carnage, shall we? The game started off scrappy, with more missed tackles than a goblin trying to catch a greased pig. But then the bodies started hitting the floor! **Amedeo Bari**‚Äîwhat a champ‚Äîlaid a slobber... er, a *bone-shattering* hit on **Zadoc Wyatan**, sending them to the dirt early! But I‚Äôll give credit where it's due, the Tamers' **Dric Trilley** was a one-demon wrecking crew, taking out both **Ahasuerus An** and **Olnek Vizzone** back-to-back! The healers were working overtime before we even hit the half!

Speaking of the half, we went into the break tied at goose eggs, thanks to a wild interception by the Tamers' **Zadoc Wyatan** picking off **As Utter**. But the second half? **PURE CORRUPTION MAGIC!** ‚ú® After the break, **Smith Syst**‚Äîfresh off her worm diet‚Äîtook that troll head, sprinted down the field, and launched a rocket from the 2-point line! **BOOM! SCORE!** That‚Äôs how you do it! 

The Tamers tried to respond, bless their hearts. **Alwyn Wandy** lined up a shot from the Away Field to tie it up... and **MISSED**! Wide right! Maybe the wind took it? Maybe the guilt of being associated with **Caenis the Fatebreaker** weighed down the ball? Who knows! Ha!

The rest of the game was a masterclass in pain. **Ellette Paz** nearly took **Odericus Juxon's** head off with a beautiful tackle, and **Judi Carrington** made sure **Zadoc Wyatan** regretted waking up today with another crushing injury! The Corruptors held the line, ignored the altitude, and proved that mud is thicker than mountain air!

So there you have it, folks! The **Ebon Gate Corruptors** walk away victorious, leaving the **Oread's Summit Tamers** to nurse their wounds and drink their sad, juice-box grog. This is **Nok the Corrupter**, signing off! Remember: It's not about whether you win or lose, it's about how much permanent damage you inflict along the way! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüíÄ
